dynamic_line: &Whatever is actually happening, your mind perceives you walking up to an intersection.  There are 3 roads, one flat barren and empty, one dark, damaged and mountainous, and one the way you came from.
&You walk for what feels like weeks without seeing a single landmark or change of scenery.
&Years pass, maybe decades and still nothing changes.  Nothing that is but you.

responses.text: Time spent is different than time lived

dynamic_line: &Without the road as a contrast it is impossible to say anything at all about where you go.  After a long time some dormant sense begins to feel slight resonances.
&You walk back for what feels like several times longer than it took you to get here.  When you finally get back the sun seems to be setting.

responses.text: Prepare to sleep through the night
Prepare to make a fire and stay alert

dynamic_line: &You climb the mountainous road.  It is a harsh journey but you are relentless and eventually reach a beautiful lookout.

responses.text: Head back the way you came

dynamic_line: &You relax and recover your stamina while gazing on a beautiful valley.

responses.text: Abandon the climb and descend into the valley

dynamic_line: &You continue to follow the road, it grows harder and you are weary but you do not stop.  It grows dark and howls can be heard in the distance.

responses.text: Attempt to make a fire and remain alert
Attempt to find a place to hide

dynamic_line: &You climb back down the mountainous road.  It is a much easier journey and you find quickly find yourself at your starting spot.  As you arrive you are suprised to learn you are not alone, several indistinct figures suddenly appear.

&You turn around and leave before you arrive.  You're not sure where you came from or why you left but it must be better than here.  After a journey you can't quite recall, you arrive at your home.  Several figures that must be family are present and welcome you.
&You attack the figures before they can ambush you.  You quickly kill several before the others surrender.

responses.text: Apologize for the attack and release them

dynamic_line: &You embrace the figures and feel an incredibly tight and unyielding grip.

responses.text: Endure the love of your family
Attempt to flee the strangers ambush

dynamic_line: &You can't be sure of the intentions of these people so you flee.  You pass numerous buildings that you half remember looking for shelter.

responses.text: No one will check the outhouse
The tavern will let you blend in
